scripts.help: echo 'KVCache Chatbot - Available Commands:' && echo '======================================' && echo '  npm run install    - Install all dependencies' && echo '  npm run backend    - Start backend server only' && echo '  npm run frontend   - Start frontend server only' && echo '  npm start          - Start both backend and frontend (default)' && echo '  npm run all        - Start both backend and frontend (alias for start)' && echo '  npm run stop       - Stop all servers' && echo '  npm run clean      - Clean up logs and temporary files' && echo '  npm run logs       - Show backend logs' && echo '  npm test           - Run basic health checks' && echo '  npm run dev        - Start in development mode' && echo '  npm run setup      - Setup development environment'
scripts.install-deps: echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd src/api && pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd src/web && pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'Creating necessary directories...' && mkdir -p logs && mkdir -p src/api/uploads && echo '✅ Installation complete!'
scripts.backend: echo 'Starting backend server...' && cd src/api && python main.py
scripts.frontend: echo 'Starting frontend server...' && echo 'Make sure backend is running at http://localhost:8000' && cd src/web && python app.py
scripts.start: echo 'Starting KVCache Chatbot...' && echo '=========================================' && echo '  Backend:  http://localhost:8000' && echo '  Frontend: http://localhost:7860' && echo '  API Docs: http://localhost:8000/docs' && echo '=========================================' && echo '' && echo 'Press Ctrl+C to stop servers' && echo '' && echo 'Starting backend in background...' && cd src/api && python main.py > ../../logs/backend.log 2>&1 & echo 'Waiting for backend to be ready...' && timeout 30 bash -c 'until curl -s http://localhost:8000/health > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done' || echo 'Backend startup timeout' && echo 'Starting frontend...' && cd src/web && python app.py
scripts.stop: echo 'Stopping servers...' && echo 'Stopping backend (port 8000)...' && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backend process found' && echo 'Stopping frontend (port 7860)...' && lsof -ti:7860 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No frontend process found' && echo '✅ Servers stopped'
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning up...' && rm -f logs/*.log && rm -rf src/api/uploads/* && echo '✅ Cleanup complete'
scripts.test: echo 'Running health checks...' && echo 'Checking backend health...' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/health && echo '✅ Backend is healthy' || echo '❌ Backend is not responding' && echo 'Checking frontend accessibility...' && curl -s http://localhost:7860 > /dev/null && echo '✅ Frontend is accessible' || echo '❌ Frontend is not accessible'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting in development mode...' && echo 'Backend will auto-reload on changes' && echo 'Frontend will auto-reload on changes' && echo '' && echo 'Starting backend with auto-reload...' && cd src/api && python main.py & echo 'Waiting for backend...' && sleep 5 && echo 'Starting frontend...' && cd src/web && python app.py
scripts.setup: echo 'Setting up development environment...' && npm run install-deps && echo 'Creating .env template...' && echo '# LLM Configuration' > .env.template && echo 'LLM_MODEL=gpt-3.5-turbo' >> .env.template && echo 'LLM_API_KEY=your_api_key_here' >> .env.template && echo 'LLM_BASE_URL=' >> .env.template && echo 'LLM_TEMPERATURE=0.7' >> .env.template && echo 'LLM_MAX_TOKENS=2000' >> .env.template && echo '✅ Development environment ready!' && echo 'Copy .env.template to .env and configure your settings'
